basics.name: Shuvam Aich
basics.label: Student, Developer
basics.summary: A software developer with three years of experience specializing in modern JavaScript frameworks in the Fintech and Automotive sectors. Proficient in Automation, DevOps, Quality Assurance, and Front-end Development. Committed to continuous learning and excelling in team settings, with a focus on delivering superior code quality and tackling intricate challenges. Eager to contribute to Generative AI and Data Analytics initiatives. I am studying for a M.S. in Computer Science at the University of Stuttgart. I expect to graduate in March 2026.
